original_title: Sithma Associates clinches Gold Award at National Industrial Excellence Awards 2023
original_body_lines: Sithma Associates (Pvt) Limited, a leading printing and packaging service provider in the country, bagged the Gold Award in the Medium Scale Category at the National Industrial Excellence Awards 2023 organised by the Industrial Development Board (IDB). The Award was received by the Company’s Managing Director Harendra Ganewatta, Chief Financial Officer (CFO) Romesh Eashan, and Head of Sales Diluk Prashad, at a grand ceremony held at the Nelum Pokuna Mahinda Rajapaksa Theatre in Colombo under the patronage of the President and Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilisation, and National Policies, Ranil Wickremesinghe.

The Company features an ever-expanding team of over 100 employees and strategic partnerships encompassing 500+ prestigious brands. They provide packaging solutions to a wide range of products including liquor, tea, apparel products, cosmetics, dairy products, pharmaceutical products, and fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) items, while their printing-related products include magazines, coffee table books, notebooks, calendars, and annual reports.
